abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32651581, pmid32647131, pmid32651728, pmid32657635, pmid32646977, pmid32646869, pmid32644986, pmid32634029, pmid32658964, pmid32644980, pmid32553350, pmid32648092, pmid32628410, pmid32658359, pmid32647160, pmid32651941, pmid32644981
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.07.15
